events.message: The insured has filed a claim reporting a vehicle accident that occurred on April 28, 2024. They experienced a rear-end collision on the highway.
This claim has been categorised under Auto Accident following review of incident details and keywords referencing vehicle damages.
An agent has been assigned to handle the claim and assist the customer through the claims process for their auto accident.
The claim has been officially acknowledged and confirmation sent to the policyholder to ensure their concerns are being addressed.
The claims team has requested police reports, photographs of the damage, and a repair estimate for the vehicle involved in the collision.
The insured has submitted all required documents including the police report, pictures of the accident, and the mechanic's repair quote.
An investigation into the circumstances of the auto accident has begun, including verification of damage and review of submitted evidence.
The investigation has been completed with findings that confirm the accident details and damage assessment submitted earlier.
A settlement amount proposal has been communicated to the policyholder, covering vehicle repair costs and incident-related expenses.
The insured provided positive feedback regarding the clarity of the settlement proposal and the support received during the process.
The claim has been formally approved following acceptance of the settlement terms by the policyholder.
Payment for the approved settlement has been issued to the policyholderâ€™s designated bank account without delay.
The claim file has been officially closed after successful processing, with all payments completed and documentation archived.
All claim records and documents related to this auto accident have been securely archived as per company policy for future reference.
